dimension.description: This option forces the image to be treated as a specified-dimensional image. If not specified, the program tries to infer the dimensionality from the input image. [default=3]

noise_model.description: Employ a Rician or Gaussian noise model. [default=Gaussian]

num_threads.description: Number of ITK threads to use [default=1]

shrink_factor.description: Running noise correction on large images can be time consuming. To lessen computation time, the input image can be resampled. The shrink factor, specified as a single integer, describes this resampling. Shrink factor = 1 is the default. [default=1]

save_noise.description: True if the estimated noise should be saved to file.

input_image.description: A scalar image is expected as input for noise correction.

output_image.description: The output consists of the noise corrected version of the input image.
